name: spicestory
description: SpiceStory: A minimalistic recipe sharing platform.

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.test:all: npm run test --prefix server && npm run test --prefix client
